videos.description: Duncan Robinson knocks down long 3-pointer vs. Utah Jazz

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Duncan Robinson knocks down long 3-pointer vs. Utah Jazz) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Duncan Robinson knocks down long 3-pointer vs. Utah Jazz

videos.description: Jordan Clarkson crosses over to stagger his defender, then speeds to the basket to finesse in a layup to beat the buzzer at the end of the first quarter.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Jordan Clarkson makes silky layup to beat the buzzer) 2021/11/13 ESHEET

videos.headline: Jordan Clarkson makes silky layup to beat the buzzer
